Uses of Class
org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver.ServerEndpoint

Packages that use ServerEndpoint
org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver Provides the classes to create a TCP / UDP socket server that communicates using custom serialized Java messages objects. 
 

Uses of ServerEndpoint in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver
 

Subclasses of ServerEndpoint in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver
(package private)  class ServerEndpointTCP
          Wrapper that delegates all calls directly to the decorated ServerSocket.
(package private)  class ServerEndpointUDP
          Wrapper that adds TCP like client handling to the UDP DatagramSocket.
 

Fields in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver declared as ServerEndpoint
private  ServerEndpoint SwiftSocketServer.serverEndpoint
          the server endpoint takes care of sending message to clients and receiving incoming client sockets.
 

Methods in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver that return ServerEndpoint
(package private) abstract  ServerEndpoint ServerType.createServerEndpoint(int port)
          Creates a server endpoint embedding a transport type specific socket (UDP or TCP).
